title: My first cutoff for Hansraj College was not cleared so I didn't take an admission in any college. Can I now take admission in Hans Raj College in the 2nd cutoff if cleared? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes if you are clearing second cutoff definitely you can apply and even get admission into Hansraj College. But do note that if your percent is clearing first cutoff of that respective course and you're applying in 2nd cutoff , you will be denied.
Yes. If your marks lie in the range of cutoff for hansraj ,you are eligible to apply for admission. It doesnt mattr whethr you took admission in any colg from first cutoff.
